Package bird.utilities

Class BirdMovementUtils

java.lang.Object
bird.utilities.BirdMovementUtils
Record Components:
SIZEX - width of the stage
SIZEY - height of the stage
WIDTH - width of the bird
HEIGHT - height of the bird
HUD_HEIGHT - height of the HUD, defining the ground level
public class BirdMovementUtils extends Object
Utility that choose the bird's moovements considering its position.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BirdMovementUtils(BirdActor bird, JPanel panel, BirdMover mover)
    Cuntructor that define the bird to move, the panel on which to move the bird and the mover utility.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    final void
    moveLeft()
    Perform left movement along with vertical movement.
    final void
    moveRight()
    Perform right movement along with vertical movement.
    final void
    moveVertically()
    Perform: - Down movement: if bird hasn't touched the ground yet

    removeActor()
    When the bird reaches the opposite side or gets hit from an enemy, this method will remove it form the panel.

  • Constructor Details

    • BirdMovementUtils

      public BirdMovementUtils(BirdActor bird, JPanel panel, BirdMover mover)
      Cuntructor that define the bird to move, the panel on which to move the bird and the mover utility.
      Parameters:
      bird - the bird to move.
      panel - the panel to repaint.
      mover - the mover utility.

  • Method Details

    • moveRight

      public final void moveRight()
      Perform right movement along with vertical movement.

    • moveLeft

      public final void moveLeft()
      Perform left movement along with vertical movement.

    • moveVertically

      public final void moveVertically()
      Perform: - Down movement: if bird hasn't touched the ground yet. - Up movement: if bird has already touched ground.

    • removeActor

      public final void removeActor()
      When the bird reaches the opposite side or gets hit from an enemy, this method will remove it form the panel.

    • setPause

      public void setPause()
      Method to pause the bird movements.
